about.details:
Incorporated in 2017 by Acharya Manish Ji, Jeena Sikho Lifecare Limited provides ayurvedic healthcare products & services. The company engages in conducting health check-up camps, free yoga sessions to make people aware of health problems. It offers a wide range of Ayurvedic products such as Dr. Shuddhi Package (Shuddhi Kit)-40 Day Detox Package, Shuddhi 32 Herbs Tea, Shuddhi Addiction Free Kit, Shuddhi BP Package, Shuddhi Diabetes Care Package, and Shuddhi Divya Sanjeevani-Anti-Viral Package.

The business has its own unit namely Shuddhi Ayurveda Panchkarma Hospital (HIIMS) which offers treatments for Cancer, Diabetes, Liver problems, Arthritis, Cholesterol, Thyroid, Leukoderma, Joint pain, and many more through different methods such as Ayurveda, Allopathy, Homeopathy, and Naturopathy without leaving any side effects. Jeena Sikho Lifecare operates 150+ Ayurvedic clinics in 23 states.

Competitive Strengths:

  1. Strong franchise partner network.
  2. Excellent network management & logistics.
  3. Highly experienced and Professional Team.
  4. Strong financials of the Company.

faqs.question: What is the Jeena Sikho IPO?
faqs.answer:
Jeena Sikho IPO is a SME IPO of 3700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹55.50 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹150 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on March 30, 2022, and closes on April 7, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Jeena Sikho IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Jeena Sikho IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Jeena Sikho IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Jeena Sikho IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Jeena Sikho IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Jeena Sikho IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Jeena Sikho IPO opens on March 30, 2022 and closes on April 7, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Jeena Sikho IPO?
faqs.answer: Jeena Sikho IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Jeena Sikho IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Jeena Sikho IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
